org.jdrupes.mdoclet

Class MDoclet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.javadoc.Doclet
      • org.jdrupes.mdoclet.MDoclet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.javadoc.DocErrorReporter

    public class MDoclet
extends com.sun.javadoc.Doclet
implements com.sun.javadoc.DocErrorReporter

    The Doclet implementation. It converts the Markdown from the JavaDoc comments and tags to HTML and sets a resulting JavaDoc comment using Doc.setRawCommentText(String). It then passes the RootDoc to the standard Doclet.

    See Also:
    The Doclet Specification

      • toHtml

        public String toHtml(String markup,
                     boolean fixLeadingSpaces)

        Converts Markdown source to HTML according to the options object. If fixLeadingSpaces is true, exactly one leading whitespace character (‘\u0020’) will be removed, if it exists.

        Parameters:
        markup - The Markdown source.
        fixLeadingSpaces - true if leading spaces should be fixed.
        Returns:
        The resulting HTML.

      • rootUrlPrefix

        public String rootUrlPrefix(com.sun.javadoc.PackageDoc doc)

        Returns a prefix for relative URLs from a documentation element relative to the given package. This prefix can be used to refer to the root URL of the documentation:

        doc = "<script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\""
   + rootUrlPrefix(classDoc.containingPackage()) + "highlight.js"
   + "\"></script>";
        Parameters:
        doc - The package containing the element from where to reference the root.
        Returns:
        A URL prefix for URLs referring to the doc root.

        Throws:
